import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Perform a Sell"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/agent/{agent_id}/sell/{ca}/{quantity}/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create a sell instruction for Agent. The agent's ID (`agent_id`) should be
    provided in the path parameter. Along with the `ca` (contract address) and the `quantity` to be sold.

    `Quantity` can be either `all` or a number > 0. Quantity is the amount of tokens
    to sell (in lamports for Solana or wei for Base). If `all` is provided, all tokens will be sold.

    This call simply _schedules_ the sell. The actual sell will be executed
    asynchronously. The response will contain the task ID which can be used to
    check the status of the task.

    To check status of the task, use the `/task/status/{task_id}/` endpoint.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
